definition: to file/to save a file (computer)/saved data (for a video game etc)
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]

sentences.english: This report name must be unique compared with previous reports you have run and archived.
sentences.chinese: 該報表名應該與您以前所運行並存檔的報表名不同。

sentences.english: The software mounts archive files as a local file system.
sentences.chinese: 這個軟件把存檔文件掛裝爲本地文件系統。

sentences.english: The inserted type spine lable, easy to sort out and file.
sentences.chinese: 插式背條，便於工作歸類存檔。

sentences.english: Use se other flashcard's save files directly.
sentences.chinese: 可以直接拷貝使用其他燒錄卡的存檔。

sentences.english: Only the person who archived can retrieved the same document.
sentences.chinese: 只有存檔的人才能檢索同一篇文檔。

sentences.english: Unzip the archive to the directory of your choice.
sentences.chinese: 把存檔文件解壓到您選擇的目錄中。

sentences.english: Please retain a photocopy for you and your employee's own records.
sentences.chinese: 請閣下與僱員各保留一份影印本作存檔之用。

sentences.english: Installation only takes unzipping an archive.
sentences.chinese: 安裝只需要解壓縮的存檔。

sentences.english: The benefit is the archive is localized.
sentences.chinese: 優點是存檔在本地進行。

sentences.english: He said incident reports were filed but ignored by brass.
sentences.chinese: 他說事件報告已經存檔了，但是被那些厚臉皮忽視了。

sentences.english: We return one copy of the contract with our countersignature for your file.
sentences.chinese: 我們退回一份我們已會籤的合同供你方存檔。

sentences.english: After completing Accountable Document Status Report monthly, bind up it and keep it in the archives .
sentences.chinese: 每月完成控管文件情況報告後，裝訂成冊，存檔。

sentences.english: And archive your newsletters or bulletins on your site.
sentences.chinese: 新聞郵件或公告也應該發佈到網站上存檔。

sentences.english: Everything in the game was created on the basis of archive photos and other chronicles.
sentences.chinese: 一切都在遊戲中已建立的基礎上存檔照片及其他方誌。

sentences.english: Mobile users can opt to retrieve only some or all archived documents.
sentences.chinese: 移動用戶可以選擇檢索部分或所有的存檔文檔。

definition: scope of authority/extent of power/(access etc) privileges
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to put down in writing/to take down notes/transcript/record
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
